accountSettings.title: Account Settings
accountSettings.subtext: Manage your account settings and preferences.
accountSettings.dangerZoneDesc: Actions in this section are permanent and cannot be undone. Deleting your account will remove all your progress, mines, and items forever. Please make sure you are absolutely certain before continuing.
accountSettings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
accountSettings.usernameError: Username must be between 3 and 32 characters long and only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
accountSettings.emailError: Email must be between 3 and 64 characters long and valid.
accountSettings.updateAccountConfirm: Are you sure you want to update your account information?
